Params: {1: '1', 3: 'Smoke swirls through the air, and from its depths looms the massive Mirror Demon with wings unfurling from its back.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dante', 3: 'Finally dropped the human act and decided to face us yourself?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As the group turns away, the demon strikes—a blur of motion from the haze—only for Lucia to descend timely from above, intercepting the attack with a flash of steel.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, I ran into Bridget outside the tower. She was bringing Lyca in, so I took over for her.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lyca, is there a reason why you had to come here?', 3: '35'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lyca', 3: "I have... half of the Mirror Demon's power within me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dante', 3: 'We had our suspicions. She\'s no longer human. "Demon" would be a more fitting term for what she is now.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'From what Bridget learned from Asimov, Lyca...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lucia glances at Lyca, then decides to reveal the truth anyway.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Lyca died from a hereditary disease several years ago, just like her mother...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lyca', 3: "I exist because of my dad's obsession. Without my help, you won't be able to defeat the Mirror Demon.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'What will happen to you if we accept your "help"?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dante, Vergil, can you separate the demon from Thomas?', 3: '67'}
{2: 'Vergil', 3: 'Yamato holds the power to sever man from demon. I will attempt it.', 4: '2'}
